# Border Filter Del
<!--
@name: Border Filter Del
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Remove a specific or all filters applied to drawing operations.
## Parameters

- **filterName&dollar;**: Name of the filter to be removed (see list in the Draw Filter instruction)
---
